info.title: Jasper
info.description: Jasper is an on-brand AI platform for businesses. It helps creators use generative AI to break through writer’s block, create original imagery, and repackage content into different formats, tones and languages. Unlike most AI tools which are tied to individual tools and can produce pretty generic outputs, Jasper can be trained on your brand and called up on any platform you use from email to social media to your website.

post.description: Run a command to generate an AI output.
Continue writing content by using a previous AI text output or other written content as background information.

get.description: Retrieve all templates available in your workspace including default templates and custom templates.
Retrieve an individual default or custom template available in your workspace by identifier.

post.description: Run a default template or custom template by identifier to generate an AI output.

get.description: Retrieves a list of knowledges available to your workspace, sorted from most recently created.

post.description: Creates a knowledge for use in personalizing AI outputs.

get.description: Retrieves a list of tones available to your workspace, sorted from most recently created.

post.description: Creates a tone for use in personalizing AI outputs.
